title: Trade-off relation between integrated metrological gain and local dissipation in magnetic-field sensing by quantum spin ensemble
summary: Quantum metrology plays a central role in precision sensing, where quantum enhancement of detection performance is crucial for both fundamental studies and practical applications. In this work, we derive a tight performance bound for magnetic-field sensing with a spin ensemble in the presence of dissipation.
